detail_desc: Pyjamas in ribbed jersey made from a soft viscose blend with a strappy top and calf-length bottoms. V-neck top with buttons at the top, an elasticated top edge and narrow, adjustable elastic shoulder straps. Bottoms with an elasticated waist, decorative drawstring and wide, straight legs.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y), small print motif at the top and a chest pocket.
Straight-cut dress in airy, crisp cotton poplin with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and long puff sleeves. Seam at the hips and a wide, gathered flounced skirt. Unlined.
Straight-cut dress in airy, crisp cotton poplin with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and long puff sleeves. Seam at the hips and a wide, gathered flounced skirt. Unlined.
Lined, non-wired, one-shoulder bikini top with a cut-out section at the front. No fasteners.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a cut-out section at one side and a high cut at the back.

Soft, non-wired bra top in lace and jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and side support. Jersey-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Fully lined, one-shoulder swimsuit. One wide shoulder strap with a cut-out section at the front, a cut-out section at one side, high-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.
Lined, non-wired triangle bikini top with a small metal ring at the front. Adjustable shoulder straps, cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and ties at the back.
Lined, non-wired triangle bikini top with a small metal ring at the front. Adjustable shoulder straps, cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and ties at the back.
Lined, non-wired triangle bikini top with a small metal ring at the front. Adjustable shoulder straps, cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and ties at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, narrow straps and small metal rings at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, narrow straps and small metal rings at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, narrow straps and small metal rings at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Lined bikini top in a longer bandeau style with a concealed silicone trim at the top and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Lined bikini top in a longer bandeau style with a concealed silicone trim at the top and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.

Fitted jacket in twill made from a linen and viscose blend with notch lapels and a button at the front. Jetted front pockets, 3/4-length sleeves with a small slit at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.

Fitted jacket in twill made from a linen and viscose blend with notch lapels and a button at the front. Jetted front pockets, 3/4-length sleeves with a small slit at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.

Fitted jacket in twill made from a linen and viscose blend with notch lapels and a button at the front. Jetted front pockets, 3/4-length sleeves with a small slit at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high, V-shaped waist and high cut at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high, V-shaped waist and high cut at the back.

Sandals in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with covered wedge heels. Open toes and a foot strap at the front, an ankle-height shaft with an open section at the back and a wide ankle strap with an adjustable metal buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Platform front approx. 3.5 cm. Heel 8 cm.

Sandals in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with covered wedge heels. Open toes and a foot strap at the front, an ankle-height shaft with an open section at the back and a wide ankle strap with an adjustable metal buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Platform front approx. 3.5 cm. Heel 8 cm.
Leather sandals with covered block heels and narrow straps that tie around the ankles. Leather insoles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Leather sandals with covered block heels and narrow straps that tie around the ankles. Leather insoles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Platform sandals with suede straps and cork soles. Adjustable ankle strap with a buckle. Leather linings and insoles. Platform front 4 cm. Heel 8 cm.

Suede sandals with open toes, covered wedge heels and adjustable straps at the front with round metal buckles. Leather linings and insoles and fluted soles. Heel approx. 8 cm. Platform front approx. 3 cm.

Voluminous, calf-length, off-the-shoulder dress in a cotton weave. Elastication and a flounced trim at the top, 3/4-length balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a gathered seam and flounce at the hem for added width. Unlined.

Voluminous, calf-length, off-the-shoulder dress in a cotton weave. Elastication and a flounced trim at the top, 3/4-length balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a gathered seam and flounce at the hem for added width. Unlined.

Voluminous, calf-length, off-the-shoulder dress in a cotton weave. Elastication and a flounced trim at the top, 3/4-length balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a gathered seam and flounce at the hem for added width. Unlined.
Sleeveless top in sequin-embroidered mesh with a V-neck front and back. Jersey lining.
Low platform trainers in cotton canvas with lacing at the top and a wide loop at the back. Cotton linings and insoles. Platform front approx. 2.5 cm. Platform back 5 cm.
Low platform trainers in cotton canvas with lacing at the top and a wide loop at the back. Cotton linings and insoles. Platform front approx. 2.5 cm. Platform back 5 cm.
Low platform trainers in cotton canvas with lacing at the top and a wide loop at the back. Cotton linings and insoles. Platform front approx. 2.5 cm. Platform back 5 cm.
Trainers with lacing at the front and platform soles covered in braided jute. Canvas insoles and fluted soles. Platform approx. 4 cm.
Trainers with lacing at the front and platform soles covered in braided jute. Canvas insoles and fluted soles. Platform approx. 4 cm.
Trainers with lacing at the front and platform soles covered in braided jute. Canvas insoles and fluted soles. Platform approx. 4 cm.
Short, wide T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with dropped shoulders.

Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with pleats at the top for added width. High waist with elasticated smocking at the back, decorative buttons down the front and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined. The polyester content of the skirt is partly recycled.

Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with pleats at the top for added width. High waist with elasticated smocking at the back, decorative buttons down the front and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined. The polyester content of the skirt is partly recycled.
Mules in textured imitation leather with satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 1 cm.
Mules in textured imitation leather with satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 1 cm.

Trenchcoat in an airy weave made from a modal blend with notch lapels, buttons at the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Long sleeves with a tab and button at the cuffs, side pockets, and a single back vent. Unlined.

Trenchcoat in an airy weave made from a modal blend with notch lapels, buttons at the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Long sleeves with a tab and button at the cuffs, side pockets, and a single back vent. Unlined.

Short, boxy cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool and alpaca wool. V-neck, sparkly stone buttons down the front, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a zip down the front, hood with a decorative drawstring, kangaroo pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a zip down the front, hood with a decorative drawstring, kangaroo pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Thin metal chain bracelets in various designs, one with small, round pendants.

Biker jacket in imitation suede with quilted shoulders, a tab with a press-stud at the neck and a diagonal zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, long sleeves with sturdy ribbed jersey undersides, and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Slim-fit joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams, a back pocket and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Brushed inside.
Slim-fit joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams, a back pocket and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Brushed inside.
Slim-fit joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams, a back pocket and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Brushed inside.
Slim-fit joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams, a back pocket and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Brushed inside.

Jacket in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood with appliqués that continue down the back, a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Metal and imitation pearl earrings in various designs. Diameter from 1 cm to 2 cm.

Parka in woven fabric with a zip and wind flap with buttons down the front. Double-layered hood with an elastic drawstring and metal cord locks, diagonal flap front pockets with a button, and an inner pocket. Inner ribbing and an adjustable tab and buttons at the cuffs. Lining made from recycled polyester.

Parka in woven fabric with a zip and wind flap with buttons down the front. Double-layered hood with an elastic drawstring and metal cord locks, diagonal flap front pockets with a button, and an inner pocket. Inner ribbing and an adjustable tab and buttons at the cuffs. Lining made from recycled polyester.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter from 1.2 cm to 5 cm.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter from 1.2 cm to 5 cm.
A pair of metal hoop earrings with leaf-shaped pendants in different sizes. Length 7 cm.
Top in soft cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.
Top in soft cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.
Top in soft cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.
Imitation leather slides. Two straps, one with a buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Imitation leather slides. Two straps, one with a buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 1.5 cm.

Sandals in imitation leather with scalloped, crossover foot straps and an ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Sandals in imitation leather with scalloped, crossover foot straps and an ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Sandals in imitation leather with scalloped, crossover foot straps and an ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted soles.

Blouse in woven fabric with decorative gathers around the neckline and an opening with ties at the back of the neck. Smocked seam under the bust and long raglan sleeves with wide smocking and a frill trim at the cuffs. Unlined.

Blouse in woven fabric with decorative gathers around the neckline and an opening with ties at the back of the neck. Smocked seam under the bust and long raglan sleeves with wide smocking and a frill trim at the cuffs. Unlined.
Metal earrings in the shape of a face in profile. Length 8 cm.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. 21 pairs of studs, three pairs of hoop earrings and one pair of earrings with a pendant. Size from approx. 0.2 cm to 2.5 cm.
Twisted metal hoop earrings. Diameter 4 cm.
